import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { heroTitle = 'Discover Whitefield'; heroSubtitle = 'Explore the best places, restaurants, and activities in the heart of Bangalore\'s IT corridor'; }

{{ heroTitle }}

{{ heroSubtitle }}

🍽️

Best Dining

Discover the finest restaurants and cafes in Whitefield

🛍️

Shopping

Explore malls and local markets for a perfect shopping experience

🏞️

Parks & Recreation

Find beautiful parks and recreational spaces to unwind

Whitefield Spotlight

Phoenix Marketcity

The largest shopping destination in East Bangalore

VR Bengaluru

A unique shopping and entertainment experience

International Tech Park

The business hub of Whitefield
